passives.desc: Deals slightly more BRV damage when using chain attacks

passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Beat Rush、 Beat Rush+
passives.short_desc: Mighty Beat Rush: Increases BRV damage dealt with Beat Rush、 Beat Rush+

passives.name: Power Break
passives.desc: Low chance of inflicting 3 turns ATK Down I with BRV ATK\n*Also applies to abilities changed from BRV Attack
passives.short_desc: Power Break: Inflicts ATK Down

passives.name: Skeleton Slayer
passives.desc: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt to skeleton types with BRV Attack\n*Also applies to abilities changed from BRV Attack
passives.short_desc: Skeleton Slayer: Increases BRV damage dealt to skeleton types

passives.name: Battle Cry Attack Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises ATK for 1 turn upon using Battle Cry
passives.short_desc: Battle Cry Attack Up: Raises ATK

passives.name: Spite
passives.desc: BRV Attack becomes Critical if BRV at least INT BRV and target's BRV at least own BRV × 2\n*Also applies to abilities changed from BRV Attack
passives.short_desc: Spite: BRV Attack becomes critical hit

passives.name: Charged Battle Cry
passives.desc: Battle Cry use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Battle Cry: Raises use count of Battle Cry

passives.name: Charged Beat Rush
passives.desc: Beat Rush use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Beat Rush: Raises use count of Beat Rush

passives.name: Multi Break
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV for 3 turns upon inflicting Break
passives.short_desc: Multi Break: Raises MAX BRV

passives.name: Buff Attack Speed
passives.desc: Slightly raises ATK、 SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Attack Speed: Raises ATK、 SPD

passives.name: Beat Rush Extension
passives.desc:
Beat Rush use +2

When using Beat Rush:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK before BRV attack
 • Slight BRV damage boost
 • Slight BRV damage boost when attacking skeleton types
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use
 • Turn rate+
 • Beat Rush becomes Beat Rush+ (slight boost to BRV granted based on ATK; slight BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%; returns to Beat Rush after use; does not return to Beat Rush when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break) when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
passives.short_desc: Beat Rush Extension: Boost to Beat Rush

passives.name: The Zangan Way Attack
passives.desc: Moderately raises ATK while the Zangan Way active
passives.short_desc: The Zangan Way Attack: Raises ATK

passives.name: Battle Cry Extension
passives.desc:
Battle Cry use +1

When using Battle Cry:
 • Slight boost to BRV granted based on own ATK
 • Granted buff duration +6
 • Turn rate+
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning、 support

While the Zangan Way active:
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (melee BRV attack + HP attack)
passives.short_desc: Battle Cry Extension: Boost to Battle Cry

passives.name: Destruction Brilliance
passives.desc: • Slightly raises MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Destruction Brilliance: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Beat Rush Recovery Attack Up Extension
passives.desc: When using Beat Rush Recovery Attack Up:\n • Slight raised ATK boost
passives.short_desc: Beat Rush Recovery Attack Up Extension: Boost to Beat Rush Recovery Attack Up

passive.name: Beat Rush Recovery Attack Up Growth
passive.desc: Beat Rush Recovery Attack Up use +2
passive.short_desc: Beat Rush Recovery Attack Up Growth: Boost to Beat Rush Recovery Attack Up

passive.name: Critical Attack Longer
passive.desc: Raises ATK by 10% for 6 turns when dealing critical hit

passive.name: Iron Fist
passive.desc: When using Beat Rush、 Beat Rush+:\n • BRV damage boost\n • ATK Down hit rate+、 duration+
passive.short_desc: Iron Fist: Boost to Beat Rush

passive.name: The Zangan Wisdom
passive.desc: Increased BRV based on ATK gained with Battle Cry\nBattle Cry turn rate+\nMAX BRV Up、 the Zangan Way boost、 duration+
passive.short_desc: The Zangan Wisdom: Boost to Battle Cry

passive.name: Fistful of Feelings
passive.desc: May equip EX ability Dolphin Blow
passive.short_desc: Fistful of Feelings: May equip Dolphin Blow

passives.name: Mighty Dolphin Blow
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Dolphin Blow、 Dolphin Blow Combo
passives.short_desc: Mighty Dolphin Blow: Increases BRV damage dealt with Dolphin Blow、 Dolphin Blow Combo

passives.name: Dolphin Blow Buff Longer
passives.desc: Fever Time duration +3
passives.short_desc: Dolphin Blow Buff Longer: Fever Time duration+

passives.name: Dolphin Blow Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Dolphin Blow
passives.short_desc: Dolphin Blow Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Dolphin Blow

passive.name: Fistful of Feelings Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Dolphin Blow
passive.short_desc: Fistful of Feelings Extension: Boost to Dolphin Blow

passives.name: Dolphin Blow BRV Hit Plus Force Advance
passives.desc: When using Dolphin Blow、 Dolphin Blow Combo:\n • Total BRV attack hit count increased by 2; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage\n • Moderately raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Dolphin Blow BRV Hit Plus Force Advance: Boost to Dolphin Blow

passives.name: Fistful of Feelings Extension Attack Boost Up++
passives.desc:
While equipping EX+ weapon Motor Drive (VII)+ or passive ability Fistful of Feelings Extension:
 • Moderately raises MAX BRV、 slightly raises ATK

While Fever Time active:
 • BRV Attack、 BRV Attack+ become BRV Attack++ (increases BRV based on ATK、 before BRV attack)
 • HP Attack、 HP Attack+ become HP Attack++ (increases BRV based on ATK; melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
passives.short_desc: Fistful of Feelings Extension Attack Boost Up++: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Dolphin Blow Buff Starting
passives.desc: 6 turns Fever Time at start of quest
passives.short_desc: Dolphin Blow Buff Starting: Fever Time at start of quest

passives.name: Dolphin Blow Combo Delay Plus
passives.desc:
Dolphin Blow becomes Dolphin Blow Combo、 triggers the following before attack:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK
 • 3-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 200%
 • Increases BRV by 50% of HP damage dealt
 • Delays target 1 turn
passives.short_desc: Dolphin Blow Combo Delay Plus: Boost to Dolphin Blow
